##### Contact Us​

Physical Address:  500 Conrad Hilton Blvd, Cisco, TX 76437;

Mailing Address:  P.O. Box 110 , Cisco, TX  76437       

Phone Number:  254.442.2111

Email:  [citymanager@](mailto:citymanager@cityofcisco.com)ciscotexas.gov  or  citysecretary@ciscotexas.gov

* [![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/8d4ab8a5a8d2818b2be4adc07372e792?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](https://www.cityofcisco.com/photo-credits.html "City of Cisco, Lake Cisco")
* [![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/a5243595749fc050e5765115ba385856?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](https://www.cityofcisco.com/photo-credits.html "City of Cisco, Texas and US flag")
* [![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/c94df10f46186dd81e1d1a0e40adf3fc?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](https://www.cityofcisco.com/photo-credits.html "City of Cisco, Field of Bluebonnets")



* [![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/b85ba8771f258e7acba697179eb3a401?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)](https://www.cityofcisco.com/photo-credits.html "City of Cisco, South, photographer Carla Hargrove")
* ![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/e7bea3f5ac74ffd1839cd9895b0d2de5?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)

City Elections are held annually on the first Saturday of May.  For questions regarding elections, please contact the City Secretary in person at 500 Conrad Hilton Blvd, by phone at 254-442-2111 or by email at: citysecretary@ciscotexas.gov.
